channel.title: S-Macro V.beta1 Released
channel.description:
Yep thats right, It is Based off Cfj0 WMPtime... thanks cfj0 and This is FOR LEARNING PURPOSES ONLY The first beta version of S-Macro is COMPLETE!
Pic here: [URL=http://img157.imageshack.us/my.php?image=smacroscreenie2tp8.png][IMG]http://img157.imageshack.us/img157/1596/smacroscreenie2tp8.th.png[/img][/URL]
Current Functions: SendText - - Sends text Wait (time) - - Waits in millisecs WaitS (time) - - Wait in Seconds SMPw x,y - - Sets mouse pos inside selected window MouseMoveSmooth x,y - - Moves mouse smooth across screen MouseMoveSmoothW x,y - - Moves mouse smooth in selected window RClick - - LeftClicks LClick - - RightClicks DoubleClick - - Double Clicks SMP x,y - - Sets mouse pos Writeln - - Writes text into the small textbox RClickAt x,y - - Right clicks at x, y RClickAtW x,y - - Right clicks at x, y in selected window LClickAt x,y - - Left clicks at x, y LClickAtW x,y - - Left clicks at x, y in selected window FindColor - - Finds a color in selected window usage: FindColor 0 etc FindColorSpiral (color, hdc, x, y, x1, y1, x2, y2) - - Still Under Construction //Thanks Cruels\\
I plan to Improve this program So Feedback Is Appreciated... Please Dont Flame.
Thanks everyone, DArippy9324
uppit.com/jlhe
Promise it has no keyloggers... I dont have time to post jotti scan but please feel free to.
//off topic\\ Anyone know where I could get decent hosting?
//More Off Topic\\ Anyone Notice that the grapes in the haynes commercial is Black? Is that some kind of racial slur?
//On Topic\\ Auth
username: beta
Password: tester

item.title: S-Macro V.beta1 Released
item.dc:creator: @CFJ0 CFJ0
item.description:
@CFJ0 wrote:

xccd:

how do i make a script repeat?

Sub Begin()
whatever = 1
Do until whatever = 5
'Script here
whatever = whatever + 1
Loop
End Sub

item.title: S-Macro V.beta1 Released
item.dc:creator: @CFJ0 CFJ0
item.description:
@CFJ0 wrote:

This is based off my WMTPIME macro, i can clearly see some things thats just leeched… all u did was redo the design and rename the functions, also WMTPIME was open source so this blows.

PS. Opened it up in OllyDbg to be sure, and it got the EXACTLY same class names, module names, form names and so on as my macro, good job leeching, next time try some CREDIT! and btw try this login

User: Darippy
Pass: Admin

Read full topic

item.title: S-Macro V.beta1 Released
item.dc:creator: @darippy darippy
item.description:
@darippy wrote:

Yep thats right,
It is Based off Cfj0 WMPtime… thanks cfj0 and This is FOR LEARNING PURPOSES ONLY
The first beta version of S-Macro is COMPLETE!

Pic here:

Current Functions:
SendText - - Sends text
Wait (time) - - Waits in millisecs
WaitS (time) - - Wait in Seconds
SMPw x,y - - Sets mouse pos inside selected window
MouseMoveSmooth x,y - - Moves mouse smooth across screen
MouseMoveSmoothW x,y - - Moves mouse smooth in selected window
RClick - - LeftClicks
LClick - - RightClicks
DoubleClick - - Double Clicks
SMP x,y - - Sets mouse pos
Writeln - - Writes text into the small textbox
RClickAt x,y - - Right clicks at x, y
RClickAtW x,y - - Right clicks at x, y in selected window
LClickAt x,y - - Left clicks at x, y
LClickAtW x,y - - Left clicks at x, y in selected window
FindColor - - Finds a color in selected window usage: FindColor 0 etc
FindColorSpiral (color, hdc, x, y, x1, y1, x2, y2) - - Still Under Construction //Thanks Cruels\

I plan to Improve this program So Feedback Is Appreciated… Please Dont Flame.

Thanks everyone,
DArippy9324

uppit.com/jlhe

Promise it has no keyloggers… I dont have time to post jotti scan but please feel free to.
